title: Ford extends production halt at U.S. plants beyond March 30
description: Ford Motor Co said on Tuesday it does not plan to restart production at its manufacturing plants in the United States, Canada and Mexico on March 30, as was originally planned.
content: Reuters Ford Motor Co F N said on Tuesday it does not plan to restart production at its manufacturing plants in the United States Canada and Mexico on March as was originally planned The No U S automaker said it was reassessing the timing of chars
